theFencer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theFencer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theFencer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theFencer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theFencer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theFencer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theFencer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theFencer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theFencer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theFencer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theFencer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theFencer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theFencer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
